00055 static int AVI_DEBUG=0;
00056 static char DEBUG_FCC[4];
00057 
00058 #define DEBUG_PRINT(x) if (AVI_DEBUG) { printf("AVI DEBUG: " x); } (void)0

00060 /* local functions */
00061 char *fcc_to_char (unsigned int fcc);

00066 /* implemetation */
00067 
00068 unsigned int GET_FCC (FILE *fp)
00069 {
00070     unsigned char tmp[4];
00071 
00072     tmp[0] = getc(fp);
00073     tmp[1] = getc(fp);
00074     tmp[2] = getc(fp);
00075     tmp[3] = getc(fp);
00076 
00077     return FCC (tmp);
00078 }
00079 
00080 unsigned int GET_TCC (FILE *fp)
00081 {
00082     char tmp[5];
00083 
00084     tmp[0] = getc(fp);
00085     tmp[1] = getc(fp);
00086     tmp[2] = 0;
00087     tmp[3] = 0;
00088 
00089     return FCC (tmp);
00090 }
00091 
00092 char *fcc_to_char (unsigned int fcc)
00093 {
00094     DEBUG_FCC[0]= (fcc)&127;
00095     DEBUG_FCC[1]= (fcc>>8)&127;
00096     DEBUG_FCC[2]= (fcc>>16)&127;
00097     DEBUG_FCC[3]= (fcc>>24)&127;
00098 
00099     return DEBUG_FCC;   
00100 }
00101 
00102 char *tcc_to_char (unsigned int tcc)
00103 {
00104     DEBUG_FCC[0]= (tcc)&127;
00105     DEBUG_FCC[1]= (tcc>>8)&127;
00106     DEBUG_FCC[2]= 0;
00107     DEBUG_FCC[3]= 0;
00108 
00109     return DEBUG_FCC;   
00110 }
00111 
00112 int AVI_get_stream (AviMovie *movie, int avist_type, int stream_num)
00113 {
00114     int cur_stream;
00115 
00116     if (movie == NULL)
00117         return -AVI_ERROR_OPTION;
00118 
00119     for (cur_stream=0; cur_stream < movie->header->Streams; cur_stream++) {
00120         if (movie->streams[cur_stream].sh.Type == avist_type) {
00121             if (stream_num == 0)
00122                 return cur_stream;
00123             else
00124                 stream_num--;
00125         }
00126     }
00127 
00128     return -AVI_ERROR_FOUND;
00129 }
00130 
00131 static int fcc_get_stream (int fcc)
00132 {
00133     char fccs[4];
00134 
00135     fccs[0] = fcc;
00136     fccs[1] = fcc>>8;
00137     fccs[2] = fcc>>16;
00138     fccs[3] = fcc>>24;
00139 
00140     return 10*(fccs[0]-'0') + (fccs[1]-'0');
00141 }
00142 
00143 static int fcc_is_data (int fcc)
00144 {
00145     char fccs[4];
00146 
00147     fccs[0] = fcc;
00148     fccs[1] = fcc>>8;
00149     fccs[2] = fcc>>16;
00150     fccs[3] = fcc>>24;
00151 
00152     if (!isdigit (fccs[0]) || !isdigit (fccs[1]) || (fccs[2] != 'd' && fccs[2] != 'w'))
00153         return 0;
00154     if (fccs[3] != 'b' && fccs[3] != 'c')
00155         return 0;
00156 
00157     return 1;
00158 }
00159 
00160 AviError AVI_print_error (AviError in_error)
00161 {
00162     int error;
00163 
00164     if ((int) in_error < 0)
00165         error = -in_error;
00166     else
00167         error = in_error;
00168 
00169     switch (error) {
00170     case AVI_ERROR_NONE:
00171         break;
00172     case AVI_ERROR_COMPRESSION:
00173         printf ("AVI ERROR: compressed in an unsupported format\n");
00174         break;
00175     case AVI_ERROR_OPEN:
00176         printf ("AVI ERROR: could not open file\n");
00177         break;
00178     case AVI_ERROR_READING:
00179         printf ("AVI ERROR: could not read from file\n");
00180         break;
00181     case AVI_ERROR_WRITING:
00182         printf ("AVI ERROR: could not write to file\n");
00183         break;
00184     case AVI_ERROR_FORMAT:
00185         printf ("AVI ERROR: file is in an illegal or unrecognized format\n");
00186         break;
00187     case AVI_ERROR_ALLOC:
00188         printf ("AVI ERROR: error encountered while allocating memory\n");
00189         break;
00190     case AVI_ERROR_OPTION:
00191         printf ("AVI ERROR: program made illegal request\n");
00192         break;
00193     case AVI_ERROR_FOUND:
00194         printf ("AVI ERROR: movie did not contain expected item\n");
00195         break;
00196     default: 
00197         break;
00198     }
00199 
00200     return in_error;
00201 }

00207 
00208 int AVI_is_avi (char *name)
00209 {
00210     FILE *fp;
00211     int ret;
00212     
00213     fp = fopen (name, "rb");
00214     if (fp == NULL)
00215         return 0;
00216 
00217     if (GET_FCC (fp) != FCC("RIFF") ||
00218         !GET_FCC (fp) ||
00219         GET_FCC (fp) != FCC("AVI ")) {
00220         ret = 0;
00221     }
00222     else {
00223         ret = 1;
00224     }
00225 
00226     fclose(fp);
00227     return ret;
00228 }
00229 #endif
00230 
00231 int AVI_is_avi (const char *name)
00232 {
00233     int temp, fcca, j;
00234     AviMovie movie= {NULL};
00235     AviMainHeader header;
00236     AviBitmapInfoHeader bheader;
00237     int movie_tracks = 0;
00238     
00239     DEBUG_PRINT("opening movie\n");
00240 
00241     movie.type = AVI_MOVIE_READ;
00242     movie.fp = fopen (name, "rb");
00243     movie.offset_table = NULL;
00244 
00245     if (movie.fp == NULL)
00246         return 0;
00247 
00248     if (GET_FCC (movie.fp) != FCC("RIFF") ||
00249         !(movie.size = GET_FCC (movie.fp))) {
00250         fclose(movie.fp);
00251         return 0;
00252     }
00253 
00254     movie.header = &header;
00255 
00256     if (GET_FCC (movie.fp) != FCC("AVI ") ||
00257         GET_FCC (movie.fp) != FCC("LIST") ||
00258         !GET_FCC (movie.fp) ||
00259         GET_FCC (movie.fp) != FCC("hdrl") ||
00260         (movie.header->fcc = GET_FCC (movie.fp)) != FCC("avih") ||
00261         !(movie.header->size = GET_FCC (movie.fp))) {
00262         DEBUG_PRINT("bad initial header info\n");
00263         fclose(movie.fp);
00264         return 0;
00265     }
00266     
00267     movie.header->MicroSecPerFrame = GET_FCC(movie.fp);
00268     movie.header->MaxBytesPerSec = GET_FCC(movie.fp);
00269     movie.header->PaddingGranularity = GET_FCC(movie.fp);
00270     movie.header->Flags = GET_FCC(movie.fp);
00271     movie.header->TotalFrames = GET_FCC(movie.fp);
00272     movie.header->InitialFrames = GET_FCC(movie.fp);
00273     movie.header->Streams = GET_FCC(movie.fp);
00274     movie.header->SuggestedBufferSize = GET_FCC(movie.fp);
00275     movie.header->Width = GET_FCC(movie.fp);
00276     movie.header->Height = GET_FCC(movie.fp);
00277     movie.header->Reserved[0] = GET_FCC(movie.fp);
00278     movie.header->Reserved[1] = GET_FCC(movie.fp);
00279     movie.header->Reserved[2] = GET_FCC(movie.fp);
00280     movie.header->Reserved[3] = GET_FCC(movie.fp);
00281 
00282     fseek (movie.fp, movie.header->size-14*4, SEEK_CUR);
00283 
00284     if (movie.header->Streams < 1) {
00285         DEBUG_PRINT("streams less than 1\n");
00286         fclose(movie.fp);
00287         return 0;
00288     }
00289     
00290     movie.streams = (AviStreamRec *) MEM_callocN (sizeof(AviStreamRec) * movie.header->Streams, "moviestreams");
00291 
00292     for (temp=0; temp < movie.header->Streams; temp++) {
00293 
00294         if (GET_FCC(movie.fp) != FCC("LIST") ||
00295             !GET_FCC (movie.fp) ||
00296             GET_FCC (movie.fp) != FCC ("strl") ||
00297             (movie.streams[temp].sh.fcc = GET_FCC (movie.fp)) != FCC ("strh") ||
00298             !(movie.streams[temp].sh.size = GET_FCC (movie.fp))) {
00299             DEBUG_PRINT("bad stream header information\n");
00300             
00301             MEM_freeN(movie.streams);
00302             fclose(movie.fp);
00303             return 0;               
00304         }
00305 
00306         movie.streams[temp].sh.Type = GET_FCC (movie.fp);
00307         movie.streams[temp].sh.Handler = GET_FCC (movie.fp);
00308 
00309         fcca = movie.streams[temp].sh.Handler;
00310         
00311         if (movie.streams[temp].sh.Type == FCC("vids")) {
00312             if (fcca == FCC ("DIB ") ||
00313                 fcca == FCC ("RGB ") ||
00314                 fcca == FCC ("rgb ") ||
00315                 fcca == FCC ("RAW ") ||
00316                 fcca == 0) {
00317                 movie.streams[temp].format = AVI_FORMAT_AVI_RGB;
00318             }
00319             else if (fcca == FCC ("mjpg")||fcca == FCC ("MJPG")) {
00320                 movie.streams[temp].format = AVI_FORMAT_MJPEG;
00321             }
00322             else {
00323                 MEM_freeN(movie.streams);
00324                 fclose(movie.fp);
00325                 return 0;
00326             }
00327             movie_tracks++;
00328         }
00329         
00330         movie.streams[temp].sh.Flags = GET_FCC (movie.fp);
00331         movie.streams[temp].sh.Priority = GET_TCC (movie.fp);
00332         movie.streams[temp].sh.Language = GET_TCC (movie.fp);
00333         movie.streams[temp].sh.InitialFrames = GET_FCC (movie.fp);
00334         movie.streams[temp].sh.Scale = GET_FCC (movie.fp);
00335         movie.streams[temp].sh.Rate = GET_FCC (movie.fp);
00336         movie.streams[temp].sh.Start = GET_FCC (movie.fp);
00337         movie.streams[temp].sh.Length = GET_FCC (movie.fp);
00338         movie.streams[temp].sh.SuggestedBufferSize = GET_FCC (movie.fp);
00339         movie.streams[temp].sh.Quality = GET_FCC (movie.fp);
00340         movie.streams[temp].sh.SampleSize = GET_FCC (movie.fp);
00341         movie.streams[temp].sh.left = GET_TCC (movie.fp);
00342         movie.streams[temp].sh.top = GET_TCC (movie.fp);
00343         movie.streams[temp].sh.right = GET_TCC (movie.fp);
00344         movie.streams[temp].sh.bottom = GET_TCC (movie.fp);
00345 
00346         fseek (movie.fp, movie.streams[temp].sh.size-14*4, SEEK_CUR);
00347 
00348         if (GET_FCC (movie.fp) != FCC("strf")) {
00349             DEBUG_PRINT("no stream format information\n");
00350             MEM_freeN(movie.streams);
00351             fclose(movie.fp);
00352             return 0;
00353         }
00354 
00355         movie.streams[temp].sf_size= GET_FCC(movie.fp);
00356         if (movie.streams[temp].sh.Type == FCC("vids")) {
00357             j = movie.streams[temp].sf_size - (sizeof(AviBitmapInfoHeader) - 8);
00358             if (j >= 0) {
00359                 AviBitmapInfoHeader *bi;
00360                 
00361                 movie.streams[temp].sf= &bheader;
00362                 bi= (AviBitmapInfoHeader *) movie.streams[temp].sf;
00363                 
00364                 bi->fcc= FCC("strf");
00365                 bi->size= movie.streams[temp].sf_size;
00366                 bi->Size= GET_FCC(movie.fp);
00367                 bi->Width= GET_FCC(movie.fp);
00368                 bi->Height= GET_FCC(movie.fp);
00369                 bi->Planes= GET_TCC(movie.fp);
00370                 bi->BitCount= GET_TCC(movie.fp);
00371                 bi->Compression= GET_FCC(movie.fp);
00372                 bi->SizeImage= GET_FCC(movie.fp);
00373                 bi->XPelsPerMeter= GET_FCC(movie.fp);
00374                 bi->YPelsPerMeter= GET_FCC(movie.fp);
00375                 bi->ClrUsed= GET_FCC(movie.fp);
00376                 bi->ClrImportant= GET_FCC(movie.fp);
00377                 
00378                 fcca = bi->Compression;
00379 
00380                 if ( movie.streams[temp].format ==
00381                      AVI_FORMAT_AVI_RGB) {
00382                     if (fcca == FCC ("DIB ") ||
00383                         fcca == FCC ("RGB ") ||
00384                         fcca == FCC ("rgb ") ||
00385                         fcca == FCC ("RAW ") ||
00386                         fcca == 0 ) {
00387                     }
00388                     else if ( fcca == FCC ("mjpg") ||
00389                         fcca == FCC ("MJPG")) {
00390                             movie.streams[temp].format = AVI_FORMAT_MJPEG;
00391                     }
00392                     else {
00393                         MEM_freeN(movie.streams);
00394                         fclose(movie.fp);
00395                         return 0;
00396                     }
00397                 }
00398 
00399             } 
00400             if (j > 0) fseek (movie.fp, j, SEEK_CUR);
00401         }
00402         else fseek (movie.fp, movie.streams[temp].sf_size, SEEK_CUR);
00403 
00404         /* Walk to the next LIST */     
00405         while (GET_FCC (movie.fp) != FCC("LIST")) {
00406             temp= GET_FCC (movie.fp);
00407             if (temp<0 || ftell(movie.fp) > movie.size) {
00408                 DEBUG_PRINT("incorrect size in header or error in AVI\n");
00409                 
00410                 MEM_freeN(movie.streams);
00411                 fclose(movie.fp);
00412                 return 0;               
00413             }
00414             fseek(movie.fp, temp, SEEK_CUR);            
00415         }
00416 
00417         fseek(movie.fp, -4L, SEEK_CUR);
00418     }
00419     
00420     MEM_freeN(movie.streams);
00421     fclose(movie.fp);
00422 
00423     /* at least one video track is needed */
00424     return (movie_tracks != 0); 
00425 
00426 }

00428 AviError AVI_open_movie (const char *name, AviMovie *movie)
00429 {
00430     int temp, fcca, size, j;
00431     
00432     DEBUG_PRINT("opening movie\n");
00433 
00434     memset(movie, 0, sizeof(AviMovie));
00435 
00436     movie->type = AVI_MOVIE_READ;
00437     movie->fp = fopen (name, "rb");
00438     movie->offset_table = NULL;
00439 
00440     if (movie->fp == NULL)
00441         return AVI_ERROR_OPEN;
00442 
00443     if (GET_FCC (movie->fp) != FCC("RIFF") ||
00444         !(movie->size = GET_FCC (movie->fp)))
00445         return AVI_ERROR_FORMAT;
00446 
00447     movie->header = (AviMainHeader *) MEM_mallocN (sizeof (AviMainHeader), "movieheader");
00448 
00449     if (GET_FCC (movie->fp) != FCC("AVI ") ||
00450         GET_FCC (movie->fp) != FCC("LIST") ||
00451         !GET_FCC (movie->fp) ||
00452         GET_FCC (movie->fp) != FCC("hdrl") ||
00453         (movie->header->fcc = GET_FCC (movie->fp)) != FCC("avih") ||
00454         !(movie->header->size = GET_FCC (movie->fp))) {
00455         DEBUG_PRINT("bad initial header info\n");
00456         return AVI_ERROR_FORMAT;
00457     }
00458     
00459     movie->header->MicroSecPerFrame = GET_FCC(movie->fp);
00460     movie->header->MaxBytesPerSec = GET_FCC(movie->fp);
00461     movie->header->PaddingGranularity = GET_FCC(movie->fp);
00462     movie->header->Flags = GET_FCC(movie->fp);
00463     movie->header->TotalFrames = GET_FCC(movie->fp);
00464     movie->header->InitialFrames = GET_FCC(movie->fp);
00465     movie->header->Streams = GET_FCC(movie->fp);
00466     movie->header->SuggestedBufferSize = GET_FCC(movie->fp);
00467     movie->header->Width = GET_FCC(movie->fp);
00468     movie->header->Height = GET_FCC(movie->fp);
00469     movie->header->Reserved[0] = GET_FCC(movie->fp);
00470     movie->header->Reserved[1] = GET_FCC(movie->fp);
00471     movie->header->Reserved[2] = GET_FCC(movie->fp);
00472     movie->header->Reserved[3] = GET_FCC(movie->fp);
00473 
00474     fseek (movie->fp, movie->header->size-14*4, SEEK_CUR);
00475 
00476     if (movie->header->Streams < 1) {
00477         DEBUG_PRINT("streams less than 1\n");
00478         return AVI_ERROR_FORMAT;
00479     }
00480     
00481     movie->streams = (AviStreamRec *) MEM_callocN (sizeof(AviStreamRec) * movie->header->Streams, "moviestreams");
00482 
00483     for (temp=0; temp < movie->header->Streams; temp++) {
00484 
00485         if (GET_FCC(movie->fp) != FCC("LIST") ||
00486             !GET_FCC (movie->fp) ||
00487             GET_FCC (movie->fp) != FCC ("strl") ||

00489             !(movie->streams[temp].sh.size = GET_FCC (movie->fp))) {
00490             DEBUG_PRINT("bad stream header information\n");
00491             return AVI_ERROR_FORMAT;                
00492         }
00493 
00494         movie->streams[temp].sh.Type = GET_FCC (movie->fp);
00495         movie->streams[temp].sh.Handler = GET_FCC (movie->fp);

00499         if (movie->streams[temp].sh.Type == FCC("vids")) {

00509             }
00510             else {
00511                 return AVI_ERROR_COMPRESSION;

00528         movie->streams[temp].sh.right = GET_TCC (movie->fp);
00529         movie->streams[temp].sh.bottom = GET_TCC (movie->fp);

00590                 DEBUG_PRINT("incorrect size in header or error in AVI\n");
00591                 return AVI_ERROR_FORMAT;                
00592             }
00593             fseek(movie->fp, temp, SEEK_CUR);           
00594         }
00595         
00596         fseek(movie->fp, -4L, SEEK_CUR);        
00597     }
00598 
00599     while (1) {
00600         temp = GET_FCC (movie->fp);
00601         size = GET_FCC (movie->fp);
00602 
00603         if (size == 0)
00604             break;
00605 
00606         if (temp == FCC("LIST")) {
00607             if (GET_FCC(movie->fp) == FCC ("movi"))
00608                 break;
00609             else
00610                 fseek (movie->fp, size-4, SEEK_CUR);
00611         }
00612         else {
00613             fseek (movie->fp, size, SEEK_CUR);
00614         }
00615         if (ftell(movie->fp) > movie->size) {
00616             DEBUG_PRINT("incorrect size in header or error in AVI\n");
00617             return AVI_ERROR_FORMAT;
00618         }
00619     }
00620 
00621     movie->movi_offset = ftell (movie->fp);
00622     movie->read_offset = movie->movi_offset;
00623     
00624     /* Read in the index if the file has one, otherwise create one */
00625     if (movie->header->Flags & AVIF_HASINDEX) {
00626         fseek(movie->fp, size-4, SEEK_CUR);
00627 
00628         if (GET_FCC(movie->fp) != FCC("idx1")) {
00629             DEBUG_PRINT("bad index informatio\n");
00630             return AVI_ERROR_FORMAT;
00631         }
00632 
00633         movie->index_entries = GET_FCC (movie->fp)/sizeof(AviIndexEntry);
00634         if (movie->index_entries == 0) {
00635             DEBUG_PRINT("no index entries\n");
00636             return AVI_ERROR_FORMAT;
00637         }
00638 
00639         movie->entries = (AviIndexEntry *) MEM_mallocN (movie->index_entries * sizeof(AviIndexEntry),"movieentries");
00640 
00641         for (temp=0; temp < movie->index_entries; temp++) {
00642             movie->entries[temp].ChunkId = GET_FCC (movie->fp);
00643             movie->entries[temp].Flags = GET_FCC (movie->fp);
00644             movie->entries[temp].Offset = GET_FCC (movie->fp);
00645             movie->entries[temp].Size = GET_FCC (movie->fp);
00646             
00647             if (AVI_DEBUG) {
00648                 printf("Index entry %04d: ChunkId:%s Flags:%d Offset:%d Size:%d\n",
00649                        temp, fcc_to_char(movie->entries[temp].ChunkId), movie->entries[temp].Flags,
00650                        movie->entries[temp].Offset, movie->entries[temp].Size);
00651             }
00652         }
00653 
00654 /* Some AVI's have offset entries in absolute coordinates
00655  * instead of an offset from the movie beginning... this is...
00656  * wacky, but we need to handle it. The wacky offset always
00657  * starts at movi_offset it seems... so we'll check that.
00658  * Note the the offset needs an extra 4 bytes for some 
00659  * undetermined reason */
00660  
00661         if (movie->entries[0].Offset == movie->movi_offset)
00662             movie->read_offset= 4;
00663     }
00664 
00665     DEBUG_PRINT("movie succesfully opened\n");
00666     return AVI_ERROR_NONE;
00667 }
00668 
00669 void *AVI_read_frame (AviMovie *movie, AviFormat format, int frame, int stream)
00670 {
00671     int cur_frame=-1, temp, i=0, rewind=1;
00672     void *buffer;
00673 
00674     /* Retrieve the record number of the desired frame in the index 
00675      * If a chunk has Size 0 we need to rewind to previous frame */
00676     while (rewind && frame > -1) {
00677         i=0;
00678         cur_frame=-1;
00679         rewind = 0;
00680 
00681         while (cur_frame < frame && i < movie->index_entries) {
00682             if (fcc_is_data (movie->entries[i].ChunkId) &&
00683                 fcc_get_stream (movie->entries[i].ChunkId) == stream) {
00684                 if ((cur_frame == frame -1) && (movie->entries[i].Size == 0)) {
00685                     rewind = 1;
00686                     frame = frame -1;
00687                 }
00688                 else {
00689                     cur_frame++;
00690                 }
00691             }
00692             i++;
00693         }
00694     }
00695 
00696     if (cur_frame != frame) return NULL;
00697 
00698 
00699     fseek (movie->fp, movie->read_offset + movie->entries[i-1].Offset, SEEK_SET);
00700 
00701     temp = GET_FCC(movie->fp);
00702     buffer = MEM_mallocN (temp,"readbuffer");
00703 
00704     if (fread (buffer, 1, temp, movie->fp) != temp) {
00705         MEM_freeN(buffer);
00706 
00707         return NULL;
00708     }
00709     
00710     buffer = avi_format_convert (movie, stream, buffer, movie->streams[stream].format, format, &temp);
00711 
00712     return buffer;
00713 }
00714 
00715 AviError AVI_close (AviMovie *movie)
00716 {
00717     int i;
00718 
00719     fclose (movie->fp);
00720 
00721     for (i=0; i < movie->header->Streams; i++) {
00722         if (movie->streams[i].sf != NULL)
00723             MEM_freeN (movie->streams[i].sf);
00724     }
00725 
00726     if (movie->header != NULL)
00727         MEM_freeN (movie->header);
00728     if (movie->streams!= NULL)
00729         MEM_freeN (movie->streams);
00730     if (movie->entries != NULL)
00731         MEM_freeN (movie->entries);
00732     if (movie->offset_table != NULL)
00733         MEM_freeN (movie->offset_table);
00734 
00735     return AVI_ERROR_NONE;
00736 }
00737 
00738 AviError AVI_open_compress (char *name, AviMovie *movie, int streams, ...)
00739 {
00740     va_list ap;
00741     AviList list;
00742     AviChunk chunk;
00743     int i;
00744     int64_t header_pos1, header_pos2;
00745     int64_t stream_pos1, stream_pos2;
00746     int64_t junk_pos;
00747 
00748     movie->type = AVI_MOVIE_WRITE;
00749     movie->fp = fopen (name, "wb");
00750 
00751     movie->index_entries = 0;
00752 
00753     if (movie->fp == NULL)
00754         return AVI_ERROR_OPEN;
00755 
00756     movie->offset_table = (int64_t *) MEM_mallocN ((1+streams*2) * sizeof (int64_t),"offsettable");
00757     
00758     for (i=0; i < 1 + streams*2; i++)
00759         movie->offset_table[i] = -1L;
00760 
00761     movie->entries = NULL;
00762 
00763     movie->header = (AviMainHeader *) MEM_mallocN (sizeof(AviMainHeader),"movieheader");
00764 
00765     movie->header->fcc = FCC("avih");
00766     movie->header->size = 56;
00767     movie->header->MicroSecPerFrame = 66667;
00768     movie->header->MaxBytesPerSec = 0;
00769     movie->header->PaddingGranularity = 0;
00770     movie->header->Flags = AVIF_HASINDEX | AVIF_MUSTUSEINDEX;
00771     movie->header->TotalFrames = 0;
00772     movie->header->InitialFrames = 0;
00773     movie->header->Streams = streams;
00774     movie->header->SuggestedBufferSize = 0;
00775     movie->header->Width = 0;
00776     movie->header->Height = 0;
00777     movie->header->Reserved[0] = 0;
00778     movie->header->Reserved[1] = 0;
00779     movie->header->Reserved[2] = 0;
00780     movie->header->Reserved[3] = 0;
00781 
00782     movie->streams = (AviStreamRec *) MEM_mallocN (sizeof(AviStreamRec) * movie->header->Streams,"moviestreams");
00783 
00784     va_start (ap, streams);
00785 
00786     for (i=0; i < movie->header->Streams; i++) {
00787         movie->streams[i].format = va_arg(ap, AviFormat);
00788 
00789         movie->streams[i].sh.fcc = FCC ("strh");
00790         movie->streams[i].sh.size = 56;
00791         movie->streams[i].sh.Type = avi_get_format_type (movie->streams[i].format);
00792         if (movie->streams[i].sh.Type == 0)
00793             return AVI_ERROR_FORMAT;
00794 
00795         movie->streams[i].sh.Handler = avi_get_format_fcc (movie->streams[i].format);
00796         if (movie->streams[i].sh.Handler == 0)
00797             return AVI_ERROR_FORMAT;
00798 
00799         movie->streams[i].sh.Flags = 0;
00800         movie->streams[i].sh.Priority = 0;
00801         movie->streams[i].sh.Language = 0;
00802         movie->streams[i].sh.InitialFrames = 0;
00803         movie->streams[i].sh.Scale = 66667;
00804         movie->streams[i].sh.Rate = 1000000;
00805         movie->streams[i].sh.Start = 0;
00806         movie->streams[i].sh.Length = 0;
00807         movie->streams[i].sh.SuggestedBufferSize = 0;
00808         movie->streams[i].sh.Quality = 10000;
00809         movie->streams[i].sh.SampleSize = 0;
00810         movie->streams[i].sh.left = 0;
00811         movie->streams[i].sh.top = 0;
00812         movie->streams[i].sh.right = 0;
00813         movie->streams[i].sh.bottom = 0;
00814 
00815         if (movie->streams[i].sh.Type == FCC("vids")) { 
00816 #if 0
00817             if (movie->streams[i].format == AVI_FORMAT_MJPEG) {
00818                 movie->streams[i].sf = MEM_mallocN (sizeof(AviBitmapInfoHeader) 
00819                                         + sizeof(AviMJPEGUnknown),"moviestreamformatL");
00820                 movie->streams[i].sf_size = sizeof(AviBitmapInfoHeader) + sizeof(AviMJPEGUnknown);
00821             }
00822             else {
00823 #endif
00824             movie->streams[i].sf = MEM_mallocN (sizeof(AviBitmapInfoHeader),  "moviestreamformatS");
00825             movie->streams[i].sf_size = sizeof(AviBitmapInfoHeader);
00826 
00827             ((AviBitmapInfoHeader *) movie->streams[i].sf)->fcc = FCC ("strf");
00828             ((AviBitmapInfoHeader *) movie->streams[i].sf)->size = movie->streams[i].sf_size - 8;
00829             ((AviBitmapInfoHeader *) movie->streams[i].sf)->Size = movie->streams[i].sf_size - 8;
00830             ((AviBitmapInfoHeader *) movie->streams[i].sf)->Width = 0;
00831             ((AviBitmapInfoHeader *) movie->streams[i].sf)->Height = 0;
00832             ((AviBitmapInfoHeader *) movie->streams[i].sf)->Planes = 1;
00833             ((AviBitmapInfoHeader *) movie->streams[i].sf)->BitCount = 24;
00834             ((AviBitmapInfoHeader *) movie->streams[i].sf)->Compression = avi_get_format_compression (movie->streams[i].format);
00835             ((AviBitmapInfoHeader *) movie->streams[i].sf)->SizeImage = 0;
00836             ((AviBitmapInfoHeader *) movie->streams[i].sf)->XPelsPerMeter = 0;
00837             ((AviBitmapInfoHeader *) movie->streams[i].sf)->YPelsPerMeter = 0;
00838             ((AviBitmapInfoHeader *) movie->streams[i].sf)->ClrUsed = 0;
00839             ((AviBitmapInfoHeader *) movie->streams[i].sf)->ClrImportant = 0;
00840 
00841 /*
00842             if (movie->streams[i].format == AVI_FORMAT_MJPEG) {
00843                 AviMJPEGUnknown *tmp;
00844                 
00845                 tmp = (AviMJPEGUnknown *) ((char*) movie->streams[i].sf +sizeof(AviBitmapInfoHeader));
00846                 
00847                 tmp->a = 44;
00848                 tmp->b = 24;
00849                 tmp->c = 0;
00850                 tmp->d = 2;
00851                 tmp->e = 8;
00852                 tmp->f = 2;
00853                 tmp->g = 1;
00854             }
00855         }
00856         else if (movie->streams[i].sh.Type == FCC("auds")) {
00857             // pass
00858         }
00859 */
00860         }
00861     }
00862 
00863     list.fcc = FCC("RIFF");
00864     list.size = 0;
00865     list.ids = FCC("AVI ");
00866 
00867     awrite (movie, &list, 1, sizeof(AviList), movie->fp, AVI_LIST);
00868 
00869     list.fcc = FCC("LIST");
00870     list.size = 0;
00871     list.ids = FCC("hdrl");
00872 
00873     awrite (movie, &list, 1, sizeof(AviList), movie->fp, AVI_LIST);
00874 
00875     header_pos1 = ftell(movie->fp);
00876 
00877     movie->offset_table[0] = ftell(movie->fp);
00878 
00879     awrite (movie, movie->header, 1, sizeof(AviMainHeader), movie->fp, AVI_MAINH);
00880 
00881     for (i=0; i < movie->header->Streams; i++) {
00882         list.fcc = FCC("LIST");
00883         list.size = 0;
00884         list.ids = FCC("strl");
00885 
00886         awrite (movie, &list, 1, sizeof(AviList), movie->fp, AVI_LIST);
00887 
00888         stream_pos1 = ftell(movie->fp);
00889 
00890         movie->offset_table[1+i*2] = ftell(movie->fp);
00891         awrite (movie, &movie->streams[i].sh, 1, sizeof(AviStreamHeader), movie->fp, AVI_STREAMH);
00892 
00893         movie->offset_table[1+i*2+1] = ftell(movie->fp);
00894         awrite (movie, movie->streams[i].sf, 1, movie->streams[i].sf_size, movie->fp, AVI_BITMAPH);
00895 
00896         stream_pos2 = ftell(movie->fp);
00897 
00898         fseek (movie->fp, stream_pos1-8, SEEK_SET);
00899 
00900         PUT_FCCN((stream_pos2-stream_pos1+4L), movie->fp);
00901 
00902         fseek (movie->fp, stream_pos2, SEEK_SET);
00903     }
00904 
00905     junk_pos= ftell(movie->fp);
00906 
00907     if (junk_pos < 2024 - 8) {
00908         chunk.fcc = FCC("JUNK");
00909         chunk.size = 2024 - 8 - (int)junk_pos;
00910 
00911         awrite (movie, &chunk, 1, sizeof(AviChunk), movie->fp, AVI_CHUNK);
00912 
00913         for (i=0; i < chunk.size; i++)
00914             putc(0, movie->fp);
00915     }
00916 
00917     header_pos2 = ftell(movie->fp);
00918 
00919     list.fcc = FCC("LIST");
00920     list.size = 0;
00921     list.ids = FCC("movi");
00922 
00923     awrite (movie, &list, 1, sizeof(AviList), movie->fp, AVI_LIST);
00924 
00925     movie->movi_offset = ftell(movie->fp)-8L;
00926 
00927     fseek (movie->fp, AVI_HDRL_SOFF, SEEK_SET);
00928 
00929     PUT_FCCN((header_pos2-header_pos1+4L), movie->fp);
00930 
00931     return AVI_ERROR_NONE;
00932 }
00933 
00934 AviError AVI_write_frame (AviMovie *movie, int frame_num, ...)
00935 {
00936     AviList list;
00937     AviChunk chunk;
00938     AviIndexEntry *temp;
00939     va_list ap;
00940     int stream;
00941     int64_t rec_off;
00942     AviFormat format;
00943     void *buffer;
00944     int size;
00945 
00946     if (frame_num < 0)
00947         return AVI_ERROR_OPTION;
00948 
00949     /* Allocate the new memory for the index entry */
00950 
00951     if (frame_num+1 > movie->index_entries) {
00952         temp = (AviIndexEntry *) MEM_mallocN ((frame_num+1) * 
00953             (movie->header->Streams+1) * sizeof(AviIndexEntry),"newidxentry");
00954         if (movie->entries != NULL) {
00955             memcpy (temp, movie->entries, movie->index_entries * (movie->header->Streams+1)
00956                 * sizeof(AviIndexEntry));
00957             MEM_freeN (movie->entries);
00958         }
00959 
00960         movie->entries = temp;
00961         movie->index_entries = frame_num+1;
00962     }
00963 
00964     /* Slap a new record entry onto the end of the file */
00965 
00966     fseek (movie->fp, 0L, SEEK_END);
00967 
00968     list.fcc = FCC("LIST");
00969     list.size = 0;
00970     list.ids = FCC("rec ");
00971 
00972     awrite (movie, &list, 1, sizeof(AviList), movie->fp, AVI_LIST);
00973 
00974     rec_off = ftell (movie->fp)-8L;
00975 
00976     /* Write a frame for every stream */
00977 
00978     va_start (ap, frame_num);
00979 
00980     for (stream=0; stream < movie->header->Streams; stream++) {
00981         unsigned int tbuf=0;
00982         
00983         format = va_arg (ap, AviFormat);
00984         buffer = va_arg (ap, void*);
00985         size = va_arg (ap, int);
00986 
00987         /* Convert the buffer into the output format */
00988         buffer = avi_format_convert (movie, stream, buffer, format, movie->streams[stream].format, &size);
00989 
00990         /* Write the header info for this data chunk */
00991 
00992         fseek (movie->fp, 0L, SEEK_END);
00993 
00994         chunk.fcc = avi_get_data_id (format, stream);
00995         chunk.size = size;
00996         
00997         if (size%4) chunk.size += 4 - size%4;
00998         
00999         awrite (movie, &chunk, 1, sizeof(AviChunk), movie->fp, AVI_CHUNK);
01000 
01001         /* Write the index entry for this data chunk */
01002 
01003         movie->entries[frame_num * (movie->header->Streams+1) + stream + 1].ChunkId = chunk.fcc;
01004         movie->entries[frame_num * (movie->header->Streams+1) + stream + 1].Flags = AVIIF_KEYFRAME;
01005         movie->entries[frame_num * (movie->header->Streams+1) + stream + 1].Offset = ftell(movie->fp)-12L-movie->movi_offset;
01006         movie->entries[frame_num * (movie->header->Streams+1) + stream + 1].Size = chunk.size;
01007 
01008         /* Write the chunk */
01009         awrite (movie, buffer, 1, size, movie->fp, AVI_RAW);
01010         MEM_freeN (buffer);
01011 
01012         if (size%4) awrite (movie, &tbuf, 1, 4-size%4, movie->fp, AVI_RAW);
01013 
01014         /* Update the stream headers length field */
01015         movie->streams[stream].sh.Length++;
01016         fseek (movie->fp, movie->offset_table[1+stream*2], SEEK_SET);
01017         awrite (movie, &movie->streams[stream].sh, 1, sizeof(AviStreamHeader), movie->fp, AVI_STREAMH);
01018     }
01019     va_end (ap);
01020 
01021     /* Record the entry for the new record */
01022 
01023     fseek (movie->fp, 0L, SEEK_END);
01024 
01025     movie->entries[frame_num * (movie->header->Streams+1)].ChunkId = FCC("rec ");
01026     movie->entries[frame_num * (movie->header->Streams+1)].Flags = AVIIF_LIST;
01027     movie->entries[frame_num * (movie->header->Streams+1)].Offset = rec_off-8L-movie->movi_offset;
01028     movie->entries[frame_num * (movie->header->Streams+1)].Size = ftell(movie->fp)-(rec_off+4L);
01029 
01030     /* Update the record size */
01031     fseek (movie->fp, rec_off, SEEK_SET);
01032     PUT_FCCN (movie->entries[frame_num * (movie->header->Streams+1)].Size, movie->fp);
01033 
01034     /* Update the main header information in the file */
01035     movie->header->TotalFrames++;
01036     fseek (movie->fp, movie->offset_table[0], SEEK_SET);
01037     awrite (movie, movie->header, 1, sizeof(AviMainHeader), movie->fp, AVI_MAINH);
01038 
01039     return AVI_ERROR_NONE;
01040 }
01041 
01042 AviError AVI_close_compress (AviMovie *movie)
01043 {
01044     int temp, movi_size, i;
01045 
01046     fseek (movie->fp, 0L, SEEK_END);
01047     movi_size = ftell (movie->fp);
01048 
01049     PUT_FCC ("idx1", movie->fp);
01050     PUT_FCCN ((movie->index_entries*(movie->header->Streams+1)*16), movie->fp);
01051 
01052     for (temp=0; temp < movie->index_entries*(movie->header->Streams+1); temp++)
01053         awrite (movie, &movie->entries[temp], 1, sizeof(AviIndexEntry), movie->fp, AVI_INDEXE);
01054 
01055     temp = ftell (movie->fp);
01056 
01057     fseek (movie->fp, AVI_RIFF_SOFF, SEEK_SET);
01058 
01059     PUT_FCCN((temp-8L), movie->fp);
01060 
01061     fseek (movie->fp, movie->movi_offset, SEEK_SET);
01062 
01063     PUT_FCCN((movi_size-(movie->movi_offset+4L)),movie->fp);
01064 
01065     fclose (movie->fp);
01066 
01067     for (i=0; i < movie->header->Streams; i++) {
01068         if (movie->streams[i].sf != NULL)
01069             MEM_freeN (movie->streams[i].sf);
01070     }
01071     if (movie->header != NULL)
01072         MEM_freeN (movie->header);
01073     if (movie->entries != NULL)
01074         MEM_freeN (movie->entries);
01075     if (movie->streams != NULL)
01076         MEM_freeN (movie->streams);
01077     if (movie->offset_table != NULL)
01078         MEM_freeN (movie->offset_table);
01079     return AVI_ERROR_NONE;
01080 }
